'''The Curse of Fëanor''' is the sixth track for [[Blind Guardian]]'s Tolkien themed album, ''[[Nightfall in Middle-Earth]]''. [[Fëanor]] expresses anger, but has no regret and doesn't stray from his goal to win the [[Silmarils]] back.
